title: The doggy park debacle
text: I do greatly wish to make it to the doggie parkz with Venaz and LumBugz.. However I do bigz behindz on da HWz so I must stay home and finish HWz.  This is the biggest debacle....

title: Lumi is the greatest thing to mankind
text: Lumi is the cutest thing in the entire world. I love him so much and he has the cutest paws to ever exist.

title: Lumi is only 11 pounds 8 ounces.
text: Lumi is a miniature poodle that is very tiny. His body looks like four sticks attached to a bigger stick.
